soft_stand.title: Dealer stands on a soft value
soft_stand.description: Whether or not the dealer must stand when they reach their stand threshold with a soft hand

stand_total.title: Dealer Stands on
stand_total.description: The dealer must stand when their hand reaches this total or higher

double_after_split.title: Player can double down after spliting a pair
double_after_split.description: Whether or not a player can double down after they split a pair

payout.title: Payout for a winning hand
payout.description: Multiplicative payout for winning a hand

shuffle_freq.title: Shuffle frequency
shuffle_freq.description: The deck is shuffled every _ hands
shuffle_freq.notes: If this value is less than one, the deck will be shuffled when less than that percent of the deck remains

max_players.title: Maximum number of players
max_players.description: Maximum number of players allowed in a game

insurance_allowed.title: Player is allowed to take insurance
insurance_allowed.description: Boolean indicator for whether a player is allowed to buy insurance when the dealer shows an ace.

insurance_pct.title: Percentage of original wager needed for insurance
insurance_pct.description: If a player chooses to take insurance, the wager is for this portion of their original bet.

insurance_payout.title: Payout on insurance
insurance_payout.description: If the player purchases insurance and the dealer has blackjack, the player will receive this decimal percent of their bet back.

surrender_allowed.title: Player is allowed to surrender their hand
surrender_allowed.description: Boolean indicator for whether or not a player is allowed to surrender after receiving their hand.

num_decks.title: Number of decks the game will be played with
num_decks.description: Number of decks used in the game.

surrender_after_split.title: Player is allowed to surrender their hand after splitting it
surrender_after_split.description: Boolean indicator for whether a player is allowed to buy insurance when the dealer shows an ace.

max_split_hands.title: This is the maxmium number of hands a player can split
max_split_hands.description: This is the number of times a player many only split their hand in a single round of play
max_split_hands.notes: Be warned that if you set this too high, there is the possibility that you go on a streak of split hands and run out of cards in the deck
